participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Easy-going and adventurous. Values freedom and family above all.
participant_1.background: I am all about family and fun. I am a free spirit. The idea of working is not my cup of tea. I like to live off of the land. My parents were like this as well.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and dedicated. Loves the arts and is passionate about helping others.
participant_2.background: I went to an all girls christian high school. My mother was a sunday school teacher. I am an only child. I dance ballet. I am currently in nursing school.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I dance ballet and I am currently in nursing school.
That's cool! I used to dance ballet when I was younger, but I had to stop because I had to work to help support my family.
That's too bad. I'm glad I'm able to dance because it's something I love to do.
Yeah, it's definitely a passion of mine. What are you planning on doing with your nursing degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about working in a hospital, but I'm also considering working in a clinic.
I think you'd be a great nurse. You seem like you're really caring and compassionate.
So, what do you think of the idea of working?
I think it's important to work. It gives you a sense of purpose and it helps you support yourself and your family.
I agree. I think everyone should have to work at some point in their lives. It teaches you a lot about yourself and about the world.
I think you're right. It's definitely a good life lesson.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a free spirit?
I love the freedom to do whatever I want, whenever I want. I don't have to answer to anyone.
That sounds like it would be really nice. I wish I could be more free spirited.
You could try! Just start by doing things that you enjoy and that make you happy.
I'll try. Thanks for the advice.
